name: obsidian-sample-plugin
description: This is a sample plugin for Obsidian (https://obsidian.md)

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.deploy: rm -rf /Users/potts_g/Documents/Vault/.obsidian/plugins/properties-in-suggestion/* && mkdir -p /Users/potts_g/Documents/Vault/.obsidian/plugins/properties-in-suggestion && npm run build && cp manifest.json main.js styles.css /Users/potts_g/Documents/Vault/.obsidian/plugins/properties-in-suggestion/
